# iru_prism_application_firewall (Data Source)

List Application Firewall status for macOS devices from Prism.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_prism_application_firewall" "example" {}

output "firewall_status" {
  value = data.iru_prism_application_firewall.example.results
}
```

- `allow_signed_applications` (Boolean)
- `block_all_incoming` (Boolean)

- `device_name` (String)
- `serial_number` (String)
- `status` (Boolean)
- `stealth_mode` (Boolean)
